Publisher: Pierre Mariette le fils (French, Paris 1634–1716 Paris)
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: French Decorative Arts during the Reign of Louis XIV (1654–1715)
Description: This print is bound in Volume III of Oeuvres.  Jombert published his collection of Le Pautre in 1751. Volume III contains "desseins d'orfeverie, serrurerie, etc.;"  This print is part of a series of six plates depicting cabinets.  The series was published by Jean I Leblond, by Jean II Leblond, by Pierre II Mariette, and by Jombert in 1751.
